verses.verse: <S%H7442>Sing,<s%> O <S%H6135>barren,<s%> you that did not <S%H3205>bear;<s%> <S%H6476>break<s%> forth into <S%H7440>singing,<s%> and <S%H6670>cry<s%> <S%H6670>aloud,<s%> you that did not <S%H2342>travail<s%> with child: for <S%H7227>more<s%> are the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H8074>desolate<s%> than the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H1166>married<s%> <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H7337>Enlarge<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> of your <S%H168>tent,<s%> and let them <S%H5186>stretch<s%> forth the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of your <S%H4908>habitations:<s%> <S%H2820>spare<s%> not, <S%H748>lengthen<s%> your <S%H4340>cords,<s%> and <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> your <S%H3489>stakes;<s%>

For you shall <S%H6555>break<s%> forth on the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> and on the <S%H8040>left;<s%> and your <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H1471>Gentiles,<s%> and make the <S%H8077>desolate<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> to be <S%H3427>inhabited.<s%>

<S%H3372>Fear<s%> not; for you shall not be <S%H954>ashamed:<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> be you <S%H3637>confounded;<s%> for you shall not be put to <S%H2659>shame:<s%> for you shall <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H1322>shame<s%> of your <S%H5934>youth,<s%> and shall not <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of your <S%H491>widowhood<s%> any <S%H5750>more.<s%>

For your <S%H6213>Maker<s%> is your <S%H1167>husband;<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is his <S%H8034>name;<s%> and your <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%> the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> One of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> The <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth<s%> shall he be <S%H7121>called.<s%>

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H7121>called<s%> you as a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> and <S%H6087>grieved<s%> in <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> and a <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H5271>youth,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> you were <S%H3988>refused,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
For a <S%H6996>small<s%> <S%H7281>moment<s%> have I <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> you; but with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7356>mercies<s%> will I <S%H6908>gather<s%> you.

In a <S%H8241>little<s%> <S%H7110>wrath<s%> I <S%H5641>hid<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> from you for a <S%H7281>moment;<s%> but with <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H2617>kindness<s%> will I have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on you, <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H1350>Redeemer.<s%>

For <S%H2063>this<s%> is as the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah<s%> to me: for as I have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> that the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah<s%> should no <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H5674>go<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H776>earth;<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> have I <S%H7650>sworn<s%> that I would not be <S%H7107>wroth<s%> with you, nor <S%H1605>rebuke<s%> you.

For the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> shall <S%H4185>depart,<s%> and the <S%H1389>hills<s%> be <S%H4131>removed;<s%> but my <S%H2617>kindness<s%> shall not <S%H4185>depart<s%> from you, <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of my <S%H7965>peace<s%> be <S%H4131>removed,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that has <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on you.

O you <S%H6041>afflicted,<s%> tossed with <S%H5590>tempest,<s%> and not <S%H5162>comforted,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H7257>lay<s%> your <S%H68>stones<s%> with <S%H6320>fair<s%> <S%H6320>colors,<s%> and lay your <S%H3245>foundations<s%> with <S%H5601>sapphires.<s%>

And I will <S%H7760>make<s%> your <S%H8121>windows<s%> of <S%H3539>agates,<s%> and your <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H68>carbuncles,<s%> <S%H688><s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H1366>borders<s%> of <S%H2656>pleasant<s%> <S%H68>stones.<s%>
And <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H1121>children<s%> shall be <S%H3928>taught<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and <S%H7227>great<s%> shall be the <S%H7965>peace<s%> of your <S%H1121>children.<s%>

In <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> shall you be <S%H3559>established:<s%> you shall be <S%H7368>far<s%> from <S%H6233>oppression;<s%> for you shall not <S%H3372>fear:<s%> and from <S%H4288>terror;<s%> for it shall not <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> you.

<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> they shall surely <S%H1481>gather<s%> together, but not by me: <S%H4310>whoever<s%> shall <S%H1481>gather<s%> together <S%H5921>against<s%> you shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> for your <S%H5921>sake.<s%>

<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H1254>created<s%> the <S%H2796>smith<s%> that <S%H5301>blows<s%> the <S%H6352>coals<s%> in the <S%H784>fire,<s%> and that <S%H3318>brings<s%> <S%H4161>forth<s%> an <S%H3627>instrument<s%> for his <S%H4639>work;<s%> and I have <S%H1254>created<s%> the <S%H7843>waster<s%> to <S%H2254>destroy.<s%>

<S%H3808>No<s%> <S%H3627>weapon<s%> that is <S%H3335>formed<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you shall <S%H6743>prosper;<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> that shall <S%H6965>rise<s%> against you in <S%H4941>judgment<s%> you shall <S%H7561>condemn.<s%> <S%H2063>This<s%> is the <S%H5159>heritage<s%> of the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and their <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> is of me, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
